name: The North Face Chilkat IV Pull-On Winter Boots - Men's
description: Keep your feet warm and dry with these slip-on winter boots. Stretch panels make them easy to step into for trips to the woodpile or the backyard. With 200g Heatseeker™ insulation and DryVent™ waterproof construction, bad weather won’t slow you down.Waterproof, breathable DryVent technology seals out the elements.Light and efficient Heatseeker insulation stays warm even when wet.Rugged nubuck upper wears well.Rubber lower adds protection.Compression molded EVA midsole offers great shock absorption and all day support.Winter Grip® rubber outsole has IcePick® temperature-sensitive rubber lugs for traction in challenging conditions.
